oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The incidence of bovine spongiform encephalopathy in the progeny of affected sires and dams
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Curnow, R. N.
Hau, C. M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bovine spongiform encephalopathy
incidence
progeny
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Case control study techniques were used to compare the incidence of bovine spongiform encephalopathy (BSE) in the progeny of two affected sires and. 110 affected dams with the incidence of BSE in the progeny of animals known to be unaffected at the last record. Full article published in Veterinary Record (1996) 138, 407-408
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1996; 18
